Carry absorbing state forward for ordinal longitudinal data

carry_absorbing_forward.Rd

Carry absorbing state forward for ordinal longitudinal data

Usage

carry_absorbing_forward(df, absorb, tmax)

Arguments

df

Input data frame

absorb

Which state is absorbing? Integer.

tmax

What is the last day of the trial? Integer.

Value

Data frame with absorbing state carried forward
